## Page 1: Exports/imports of countries over time, aggregate and by industry
```{r}
#Source: https://wits.worldbank.org/datadownload.aspx?lang=en

#Establish countries: 193 UN member states + Taiwan, excludes observer states of Vatican and Palestine, and excludes Kosovo b/c it doesn't have data
country_codes <- c(
  "AFG", "ALB", "DZA", "AND", "AGO", "ATG", "ARG", "ARM", "AUS", "AUT",
  "AZE", "BHR", "BGD", "BRB", "BLR", "BEL", "BLZ", "BEN", "BTN", "BOL",
  "BIH", "BWA", "BRA", "BRN", "BGR", "BFA", "BDI", "KHM", "CMR", "CAN",
  "CPV", "CAF", "TCD", "CHL", "CHN", "COL", "COM", "CRI", "HRV", "CUB",
  "CYP", "CZE", "COD", "DNK", "DJI", "DMA", "DOM", "TLS", "ECU", "EGY",
  "SLV", "GNQ", "ERI", "EST", "SWZ", "ETH", "FJI", "FIN", "FRA", "GAB",
  "GEO", "DEU", "GHA", "GRC", "GRD", "GTM", "GIN", "GNB", "GUY", "HTI",
  "HND", "HUN", "ISL", "IND", "IDN", "IRN", "IRQ", "IRL", "ISR", "ITA",
  "CIV", "JAM", "JPN", "JOR", "KAZ", "KEN", "KIR", "KWT", "KGZ", "LAO",
  "LVA", "LBN", "LSO", "LBR", "LBY", "LIE", "LTU", "LUX", "MDG", "MWI",
  "MYS", "MDV", "MLI", "MLT", "MHL", "MRT", "MUS", "MEX", "MDA", "MCO",
  "MNG", "MNE", "MAR", "MOZ", "MMR", "NAM", "NRU", "NPL", "NLD", "NZL",
  "NIC", "NER", "NGA", "PRK", "MKD", "NOR", "OMN", "PAK", "PLW", "PAN",
  "PNG", "PRY", "PER", "PHL", "POL", "PRT", "QAT", "COG", "ROU", "RUS",
  "RWA", "KNA", "LCA", "VCT", "WSM", "SMR", "SAU", "SEN", "SRB", "SYC",
  "SLE", "SGP", "SVK", "SVN", "SLB", "SOM", "ZAF", "KOR", "SSD", "ESP",
  "LKA", "SDN", "SUR", "SWE", "CHE", "SYR", "STP", "TJK", "TZA", "THA",
  "BHS", "GMB", "TGO", "TON", "TTO", "TUN", "TKM", "TUV", "TUR", "UGA",
  "UKR", "ARE", "GBR", "USA", "URY", "UZB", "VUT", "VEN", "VNM", "YEM",
  "ZMB", "ZWE", "FSM", "TWN"
)

#Read and combine all files
folder_path <- "C:\\Users\\azhon\\Desktop\\Econ 1500\\wits\\"

p1_all_data <- do.call(rbind, lapply(country_codes, function(code) {
  file_name <- paste0("en_", code, "_AllYears_WITS_Trade_Summary.csv")
  file_path <- file.path(folder_path, file_name)
  if (file.exists(file_path)) {
    read.csv(file_path)
  } else {
    NULL
  }
}))


#Isolate export and import data
p1_export_data <- p1_all_data%>%
  filter(Partner == "World" & Indicator.Type == "Export")%>%
  filter(Indicator == "Export(US$ Mil)" | Indicator == "Exports (in US$ Mil)")%>%
  select(-c("Partner", "Indicator.Type", "Indicator"))%>%
  rename(Country_Full = Reporter, Product = Product.categories)


p1_import_data <- p1_all_data%>%
  filter(Partner == "World" & Indicator.Type == "Import")%>%
  filter(Indicator == "Import(US$ Mil)" | Indicator == "Imports (in US$ Mil)")%>%
  select(-c("Partner", "Indicator.Type", "Indicator"))%>%
  rename(Country_Full = Reporter, Product = Product.categories)


#Clean data: standardizing to country codes
full_country_names <- unique(p1_export_data$Country_Full)
codes_for_names <- c(
  "AFG", "ALB", "DZA", "AND", "AGO", "ATG",
  "ARG", "ARM", "AUS", "AUT", "AZE", "BHR",
  "BGD", "BRB", "BLR", "BEL", "BLZ", "BEN",
  "BTN", "BOL", "BIH", "BWA", "BRA", "BRN",
  "BGR", "BFA", "BDI", "KHM", "CMR", "CAN",
  "CPV", "CAF", "TCD", "CHL", "CHN", "COL",
  "COM", "CRI", "HRV", "CUB", "CYP", "CZE",
  "DNK", "DJI", "DMA", "DOM", "ECU", "EGY",
  "SLV", "ERI", "EST", "SWZ", "ETH", "FJI",
  "FIN", "FRA", "GAB", "GEO", "DEU", "GHA",
  "GRC", "GRD", "GTM", "GIN", "GNB", "GUY",
  "HND", "HUN", "ISL", "IND", "IDN", "IRN",
  "IRQ", "IRL", "ISR", "ITA", "CIV", "JAM",
  "JPN", "JOR", "KAZ", "KEN", "KIR", "KWT",
  "KGZ", "LVA", "LBN", "LSO", "LBY", "LTU",
  "LUX", "MDG", "MWI", "MYS", "MDV", "MLI",
  "MLT", "MRT", "MUS", "MEX", "MDA", "MNG",
  "MAR", "MOZ", "MMR", "NAM", "NPL", "NLD",
  "NZL", "NIC", "NER", "NGA", "MKD", "NOR",
  "OMN", "PAK", "PLW", "PAN", "PNG", "PRY",
  "PER", "PHL", "POL", "PRT", "QAT", "COG",
  "RUS", "RWA", "KNA", "LCA", "VCT", "WSM",
  "SAU", "SEN", "SYC", "SLE", "SGP", "SVK",
  "SVN", "SLB", "ZAF", "KOR", "ESP", "LKA",
  "SSD", "SUR", "SWE", "CHE", "SYR", "STP",
  "TJK", "TZA", "THA", "BHS", "GMB", "TGO",
  "TON", "TTO", "TUN", "TKM", "TUV", "TUR",
  "UGA", "UKR", "ARE", "GBR", "USA", "URY",
  "VUT", "VEN", "VNM", "YEM", "ZMB", "ZWE",
  "FSM"
)

p1_code_crosswalk <- data.frame(
  Country_Full = full_country_names,
  Country_Code = codes_for_names,
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

p1_export_data <- left_join(p1_export_data, p1_code_crosswalk, by = "Country_Full")
p1_export_data <- p1_export_data%>%select(Country_Code, everything())

p1_import_data <- left_join(p1_import_data, p1_code_crosswalk, by = "Country_Full")
p1_import_data <- p1_import_data%>%select(Country_Code, everything())


##Clean data: pivot to long data
year_columns <- paste0("X", 1988:2021)
p1_export_data_long <- pivot_longer(p1_export_data, cols = year_columns, names_to = "Year", values_to = "Export_Value")
p1_export_data_long <- p1_export_data_long%>%
  mutate(Year = as.integer(sub("X", "", Year)))%>%
  select(-c(Country_Full))

p1_import_data_long <- pivot_longer(p1_import_data, cols = year_columns, names_to = "Year", values_to = "Import_Value")
p1_import_data_long <- p1_import_data_long%>%
  mutate(Year = as.integer(sub("X", "", Year)))%>%
  select(-c(Country_Full))
```

## Page 2: Exports and economic variables
```{r}
#Get relevant export/import data
p2_tot_import <- p1_import_data_long%>%
  filter(Product == "All Products")%>%
  select(c("Country_Code", "Year", "Import_Value"))
p2_tot_export <- p1_export_data_long%>%
  filter(Product == "All Products")%>%
  select(c("Country_Code", "Year", "Export_Value"))

p2_tot_trade <- full_join(p2_tot_export, p2_tot_import, by = c("Country_Code", "Year"))
p2_tot_trade$Total_Trade <- p2_tot_trade$Export_Value + p2_tot_trade$Import_Value


#Get GDP data
#Source: https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/gdp-worldbank-constant-usd
p2_gdp_data <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\azhon\\Desktop\\Econ 1500\\gdp_data.csv")%>%
  filter(Year >= 1988 & Year <= 2021)%>%
  select(-c("Entity"))
colnames(p2_gdp_data) <- c("Country_Code", "Year", "GDP")


#Get GDP per capita data
#Source: https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/gdp-per-capita-worldbank
p2_gdp_per_capita_data <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\azhon\\Desktop\\Econ 1500\\gdp_per_capita_data.csv")%>%
  filter(Year >= 1988 & Year <= 2021)%>%
  select(-c("Entity"))
colnames(p2_gdp_per_capita_data) <- c("Country_Code", "Year", "GDP_Per_Capita")


#Get productivity data
#Source: https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/labor-productivity-per-hour-pennworldtable?time=1960
p2_productivity_data <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\azhon\\Desktop\\Econ 1500\\productivity_data.csv")%>%
  filter(Year >= 1988 & Year <= 2021)%>%
  select(-c("Entity"))
colnames(p2_productivity_data) <- c("Country_Code", "Year", "Productivity")


#Get unemployment rate data
#Source: https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/unemployment-rate
p2_unemployment_rate_data <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\azhon\\Desktop\\Econ 1500\\unemployment_rate_data.csv")%>%
  filter(Year >= 1988 & Year <= 2021)%>%
  select(-c("Entity"))
colnames(p2_unemployment_rate_data) <- c("Country_Code", "Year", "Unemployment_Rate")


#Get inflation rate data
#Source: https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/inflation-of-consumer-prices
p2_inflation_rate_data <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\azhon\\Desktop\\Econ 1500\\inflation_rate_data.csv")%>%
  filter(Year >= 1988 & Year <= 2021)%>%
  select(-c("Entity"))
colnames(p2_inflation_rate_data) <- c("Country_Code", "Year", "Inflation_Rate")


#Add macrovariable columns to trade data
p2_tot_trade <- left_join(p2_tot_trade, p2_gdp_data, by = c("Country_Code", "Year"))
p2_tot_trade <- left_join(p2_tot_trade, p2_gdp_per_capita_data, by = c("Country_Code", "Year"))
p2_tot_trade <- left_join(p2_tot_trade, p2_productivity_data, by = c("Country_Code", "Year"))
p2_tot_trade <- left_join(p2_tot_trade, p2_unemployment_rate_data, by = c("Country_Code", "Year"))
p2_tot_trade <- left_join(p2_tot_trade, p2_inflation_rate_data, by = c("Country_Code", "Year"))


##Clean data: remove any NA rows
p2_trade_gdp_complete <- p2_tot_trade%>%
  filter(!is.na(Total_Trade) & !is.na(GDP))%>%
  select(c("Country_Code", "Year", "Total_Trade", "GDP"))

p2_trade_gdp_per_capita_complete <- p2_tot_trade%>%
  filter(!is.na(Total_Trade) & !is.na(GDP_Per_Capita))%>%
  select(c("Country_Code", "Year", "Total_Trade", "GDP_Per_Capita"))

p2_trade_productivity_complete <- p2_tot_trade%>%
  filter(!is.na(Total_Trade) & !is.na(Productivity))%>%
  select(c("Country_Code", "Year", "Total_Trade", "Productivity"))

p2_trade_unemployment_rate_complete <- p2_tot_trade%>%
  filter(!is.na(Total_Trade) & !is.na(Unemployment_Rate))%>%
  select(c("Country_Code", "Year", "Total_Trade", "Unemployment_Rate"))

p2_trade_inflation_rate_complete <- p2_tot_trade%>%
  filter(!is.na(Total_Trade) & !is.na(Inflation_Rate))%>%
  select(c("Country_Code", "Year", "Total_Trade", "Inflation_Rate"))
```
